name: Alien Escape (itch) (KylenD)
description:
Title: Alien Escape 

Platform: PC Game 

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Alien Escape is a space puzzle slider game taking inspiration from the famous game Unblock Me where there are blocks in the way of the
red block that you are trying to get out of the map. In Alien Escape this game will feature aliens where you are an astronaut moving aliens out of the way to escape the level.

Instructions: THE WAY TO WIN THIS GAME IS TO CLICK AND DRAG THE THE ALIENS IN A CERTAIN WAY TO CREATE A PATH FOR THE ASTRONAUT TO GET TO THE SPACESHIP TO ESCAPE BACK TO  EARTH. THE ALIENS THAT FACE VERTICALLY CAN ONLY MOVE UP AND DOWN AND THE ALIENS THAT FACE HORIZONTALLY CAN ONLY MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT. THE SAME RULES APPKY TO THE ASTRONAUT AS WELL. HAVE FUN AND AND RUNNNN FROM THE ALIENS!!!!

Game Design Team: Kylen Dilligard - Game Designer
